title: Earth Science Project-Based Learning Design for Elementary Students

context.prior_knowledge: Experience observing natural phenomena in daily life and understanding basic scientific terminology (weather, topography, etc.)
context.additional_context: Environment enabling field observation and data collection via smartphones, with collaborative spaces configured within classrooms

learning_goals: Students can observe and document topographical features and climate conditions of their surroundings using smartphone apps.
Students can present a simple model explaining the correlation between topography and climate based on collected data.
Students can present the process of applying Earth science concepts to solve everyday problems through team projects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
